sentences.en: After a hard day's work, I vegetate in front of the television.
sentences.cn: 经过一整天劳累, 我瘫在电视机前一动不动.

sentences.en: He spends all his free time at home vegetating in front of the TV.
sentences.cn: 他把所有的空闲时间都用来窝在家里看电视。

sentences.en: I was determined when I retired that I wasn’t just going to vegetate.
sentences.cn: 我退休时便下定决心绝不让生活过得单调无聊。

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the consciousness - promoted rehabilitation therapy for the patients in persistent vegetate state ( PVS ) .
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨持续性植物状态患者的 促 醒康复方法.
这块地上旺盛地长起了植被.

sentences.en: The vegetables in the garden vegetate vigorously.
sentences.cn: 园子里的植物在茁壮成长.

sentences.en: This kind of friut vegetate in many areas.
sentences.cn: 这种水果香甜可口,生长在世界上许多地方.

sentences.en: Warts and polyps can vegetate if not removed.
sentences.cn: 疣和息肉如果不切除的话将会不停地生长.

sentences.en: When I am in the country I wish to vegetate like the country.
sentences.cn: 当我在乡村的时候,我想像乡村一样单调乏味的活着.

words.tran_cn: 植物的，植物性的；生长的
植物的；植物人状态的，无所作为的；促使植物生长的；有生长力的
植被；植物，草木；呆板单调的生活
生长；植物似地生长；茫茫然地过日子

trans.tran_cn: 生长, 过单调乏味的生话
trans.tran_en: If someone vegetates, they spend their time doing boring or worthless things

trans.tran_cn: 过单调呆板的生活，植物似地生长，<医>（瘤、疣等）长大
